traps.description: Nesting <b:section> inside another <b:section> causes parser failure.
traps.safeAlternative: Use <b:section> only at top-level. Wrap inner content in <div> or <section>.

traps.description: Multiple <main> tags confuse semantic structure and break accessibility.
traps.safeAlternative: Lock a single <main> around Blog1 or post content only.

traps.description: Comment form fails to load if placed inside hidden or conditional widgets.
traps.safeAlternative: Place comment form in visible, static section. Avoid conditional logic.

traps.description: Widgets with missing IDs or invalid types silently fail to bind.
traps.safeAlternative: Use valid widget types and ensure unique IDs. Avoid legacy widget markup.
